detectors.description:
CurveRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#708-725) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#716)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#719)
detectors.markdown:
[CurveRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#L708-L725) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#L716)
	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#L719)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in CurveRewards.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#694-697):
	External calls:
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#695)
		- uni.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#625)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#556)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#696)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#556)
		- snx.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#703)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#696)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#647)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#696)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#646)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#696)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#702)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#649)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#696)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#650)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in CurveRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#708-725):
	External calls:
	- snx.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#713)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastUpdateTime = block.timestamp (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#722)
	- periodFinish = block.timestamp.add(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#723)
	- rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#716)
	- rewardRate = reward.add(leftover).div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CurveRewards.sol#720)
